name: Almond Mix Fruit Salad
description: A refreshing medley of seasonal fresh fruits, enhanced with the delightful crunch of toasted almonds and a light, sweet dressing.

name: Apple Chicken Italian Salad
description: A vibrant Italian-inspired salad featuring crisp apples, tender grilled chicken, mixed greens, and a zesty Italian vinaigrette.

name: Banana Chicken Salad
description: An unconventional yet delicious salad combining tender chicken pieces with sweet banana slices, crisp lettuce, and a creamy, slightly tangy dressing.

name: Beans Salad
description: A hearty and nutritious salad made with a mix of beans (such as kidney, chickpeas, and black beans), fresh vegetables, and a light vinaigrette.

name: Cheese and Cucumber Salad
description: A simple yet refreshing salad with crisp cucumber slices and cubes of mild cheese, tossed in a light, creamy dressing.

name: Combination 1
description: Our Chef's Special Combination Salad 1, featuring a curated mix of fresh greens, seasonal vegetables, and a unique dressing. Ask for today's selection!

name: Combination 2
description: Explore new flavors with Combination Salad 2! A delightful blend of textures and tastes, expertly combined by our chefs.

name: Combination 3
description: Combination Salad 3 offers a unique and satisfying mix of fresh ingredients, perfect for a healthy and flavorful meal.

name: Combination 4
description: Discover our exciting Combination Salad 4, a thoughtfully crafted salad designed to tantalize your taste buds with a medley of fresh components.

name: Combination 5
description: Indulge in Combination Salad 5, a premium selection of fresh ingredients, proteins, and a signature dressing for a fulfilling experience.

name: Combination 6
description: Our popular Combination Salad 6 brings together a harmonious blend of fresh vegetables, grains, and a flavorful dressing.

name: Combination 7
description: Experience the delightful mix of Combination Salad 7, featuring a special selection of ingredients for a nutritious and tasty meal.

name: Combination 8
description: Combination Salad 8 is a chef-inspired creation with a unique blend of fresh produce and a perfectly paired dressing. A delightful choice!

name: Egg and Cucumber Salad
description: A classic and refreshing salad with chopped hard-boiled eggs, crisp cucumber, and a light mayonnaise-based dressing.

name: Fresh Fruit Salad
description: A vibrant and healthy bowl of assorted seasonal fresh fruits, cut into bite-sized pieces. Naturally sweet and refreshing.

name: Macaroni Salad
description: A creamy and comforting salad made with cooked macaroni pasta, mixed vegetables like carrots and peas, and a rich mayonnaise dressing.

name: Noodle Salad
description: A flavorful Asian-inspired salad featuring chilled noodles, crisp vegetables, and a savory, tangy dressing. Often with sesame and soy notes.

name: Pasta Salad
description: A versatile and satisfying salad with cooked pasta, fresh vegetables, cheese, and a zesty Italian or creamy dressing.

name: Russian Salad
description: A classic creamy salad made with diced boiled potatoes, carrots, peas, and sometimes chicken or eggs, all mixed in a rich mayonnaise dressing.

name: Smoked Chicken Pasta Salad
description: A delicious and hearty salad combining tender smoked chicken pieces, cooked pasta, fresh vegetables, and a creamy or vinaigrette dressing.

name: Sweet Corn Salad
description: A bright and flavorful salad featuring sweet corn kernels, bell peppers, onions, and a light, zesty lime dressing.

name: Walnut Mix Fruit Salad
description: A delightful combination of fresh seasonal fruits, enhanced with the rich, earthy crunch of walnuts and a light, complementary dressing.
